#Start analysis here: load in RData if needed
```{r}
load("RData/Bac.seq1.RData") #load cleaned data 

#Remove Samples identified below in QC
#remove dups Acer67. Acer67b, Acer272, Acer111, Acer115. Aver68b
#remove Acer 107, Acer 43 no meta
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer67")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer67b")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer272")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer43") #no meta
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer129") #unreliable meta
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer134")#unreliable meta
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer111")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer175")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer68b")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer107")
Bac.seq <- subset_samples(Bac.seq, sample_name != "Acer34")
```
